<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vishkanya Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=4035) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vishkanya" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=369" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 63</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Vishkanya Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=4025)

</column>

---

Extensive training has granted you an elegant control in the use of vishkanyan weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the [blowgun](/Weapons.aspx?ID=66), [fighting fan](/Weapons.aspx?ID=93), [kris](/Weapons.aspx?ID=264), [kukri](/Weapons.aspx?ID=56), [shuriken](/Weapons.aspx?ID=79), and all [vishkanyan](/Traits.aspx?ID=369) weapons in which you are trained.
name: Vishkanya Weapon Expertise
